participant_1.background:
I would brag about my friends being so supportive while I'm in school.
i love huge paintings.
My moped is the envy of everyone on my block because it's so colorful and unique.
My worst nightmare was when my entire short film was deleted by accident.
my favorite meal is steak.

participant_2.background:
I do not have any children, but I love my family and Netflix.
I started dating again and went to the movies on Sundays with my new love.
I always make sure my dog is well fed.
I bond with my brother over music and go to concerts.
I enjoy spending my free time cosplaying with my husband.

content.text: Hi, I'm new here! What do you like to do?
Hi! I love to spend time with my family, go to concerts, and cosplay with my husband.
That sounds like a lot of fun! What's your favorite thing about cosplaying?
I love being able to express myself and be creative. I also love meeting other people who are passionate about the same things I am.
That's awesome! What's the best cosplay you've ever done?
I think my best cosplay was when I dressed up as Harley Quinn for Halloween. I put a lot of work into it and I really felt like the character.
That sounds amazing! I'm sure you looked great.
Thanks! It was a lot of fun.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I also love going to the movies, watching Netflix, and spending time with my dog.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love going to the movies too.
Yeah, it's a great way to relax and de-stress.
What's your favorite movie of all time?
That's a tough question. I have a lot of favorites. But I think I'd have to say The Princess Bride.
That's a great movie! I love the humor and the story.
Yeah, it's a classic for a reason.
